reviewText: I have to say that watching these video has changed the way my live in boyfriend love each other. The videos are not trashy because they show how to do them and a visual aspect rather than pornography.  I love these videos and I will buy more of the loving sex dvds in the future.
You call those "trailor-park" couples attractive? You call this "instructor" a doctor? Total waste of time and money.

Very informative and there were a few positions that I haven't tried yet. I'll be back home soon and look forward to practicing these with my wife until I get it right!

I bought volumne 3 to learn a few new positions and share with my wife.  While the intro was interesting and the "professionals" offered instructional demonstrations, a young couple that was presented as "viewers of the video" really reduced the value of the lessons.  Not only were they useless, it was obvious they weren't really participating but really stole from any romantic mood.

The focus is on the spiritual aspect of love making.  I'm 61 years old and grew up in a time of sexual repression.  I'm working on learning that those feelings were barriers to experiencing the true beauty of physical closeness.  This series shows the absolute beauty of surrender and trust with a committed partner.
Intro to porn. Didn't find much sacredness in this set. Grossly modified ancient teachings of the kama sutra.

2 of these DVDs are an absolute waste the 3rd is the only one that teaches you anything.  I have seen others and think most people would prefer something more concise. There is no value in the first 2 DVDs at all don't be fooled.  Look for other suggestions online.
THIS DVD WAS DELIVERED IN A TIMELY MATTER AND THE 3 DVD SERIES WAS WORTH THE MONEY.......THEY WERE PROFESSIONALLY DONE AND WE FOUND THEM TO BE VERY INFORMATIVE
